name: Oh, Good Green! Smoothie

ingredients.name: unsweetened almond milk or oat milk
Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend or Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend

preparation: In a blender, combine spinach, milk, protein blend, banana, blueberries, nut butter, cinnamon and ice cubes, if using, until smooth. Pour into chilled glasses.
tips: For a thinner consistency, add more milk or water, as needed.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is perfectly balanced—power up your morning and stay satiated until lunch!

products.name: Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend (Pouch)
summary: We like to fuel our bodies and satisfy those chocolate cravings at the same time. Made with pea and fava bean protein, this blend turns into a velvety shake (just mix with water or milk) or morning smoothie with a luscious creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of other protein powders. It’s made with heat-stable probiotics which means baking with benefits! Add to pancake, waffle, muffin, or cookie batters. Power up your morning with an extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.

products.name: Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend (Pouch)
summary: Fuel up first thing and stay fuller longer with rich smooth-tasting vanilla blend. Made with pea and fava bean protein, this blend turns into a velvety shake (just mix with water or milk) or morning smoothie with a luscious creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of other protein powders. It’s made with heat-stable probiotics which means baking with benefits! Add to pancake, waffle, muffin, or cookie batters. Power up your morning with an extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavour. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.
